body:
Comment 2: 
Hm, yeah, I guess there is.  For some reason I thought this was supported.

I'm sure foo_test will work.  That's what the http package does with http_test.

I'm happy closing this bug, but it might serve as a good wishlist bug for the compiler
to detect cycles and fail out with a more appropriate error message.  We should help out
delusional people hacking late into the evening and stubbornly pushing on despite common
sense telling them to go to bed.
